entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
